Seriously... How many times does this shit need to be reposted??  This time with almost the minimalist amount of tags required..    Where the hell is the management of this P.O.S. site???????  If you fuckers, obviously, don't care enough to update the format, and implement some changes to make uploading, editing, and prevention (or at the least, removal) of repeat posts... Then just delete the whole fuckin' thing and let somebody else do it better.  (and fix the fucking captcha!  If it's required, then it shouldn't *only* pop p after tryint to submit, as if it was a fucking error on the users part!  Needs to be there before we can even click 'comment'!)
